mapper.select: SELECT * FROM account_book WHERE accountBookNo IN ( SELECT accountBookNo FROM share_account_book WHERE participant = #{memberNo} UNION ALL SELECT accountBookNo FROM account_book WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} and isShared = 1 ) Order by accountBookNo ASC
SELECT * FROM member WHERE memberNo = ( SELECT memberNo FROM account_book WHERE accountBookNo = #{accountBookNo} )
SELECT * FROM member WHERE memberNo IN ( SELECT participant From share_account_book WHERE accountBookNo = #{accountBookNo})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_book (accountBookTitle, memberNo, isShared) VALUES (#{accountBookTitle}, #{memberNo}, #{isShared})

INSERT INTO share_account_book ( owner, participant, accountBookNo ) VALUES ( #{owner}, (SELECT memberNo FROM member WHERE memberEmail=#{participant}), (SELECT MAX(accountBookNo) FROM account_book WHERE memberNo =#{owner}) )

INSERT INTO account_book_budget ( budgetDate, budgetAmount, accountBookNo ) VALUES ( (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')), #{budgetAmount}, (SELECT MAX(accountBookNo) FROM account_book WHERE memberNo =#{owner}) )
